entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
